elements.name: Verify if user is able to login to the application using LoginAPI's

steps.name: user calls "Login" with "Post" http request to login
the API call will be success with status code 200
get the token value from the response body
get the userId value from the response body
login message in the response body is "Login Successfully"

elements.name: Verify if the user is able to cerate a product using createProductAPI

steps.name: user calls "CreateProduct" with "Post" http request to create product
